interships.title: Sejal Exports
interships.companyDesc: Sejal Exports, a name which spells respect and trust in the industry is itself a mere product of the honest and determined efforts of Mr. Sevantibhai M.Shah who is also the founding father of the company. It was his great visualization of the industry that has been a pioneering corner stone in the inception and eventual development of the present company Sejal Exports India. After the initial establishment, the actual business enterprise of Sejal Exports India was started by Mr. Chandubhai M.
interships.location_1: 01/102 1st Floor, Adarsh Nivas, R.R Mohan Roy Road, Prathana Samaj Road, Charni Road, mumbai, 400004.

interships.title: HomeCapital
interships.companyDesc: About the Company: Home buying is one of the most important milestones in the life of every Individual. At HomeCapital, we believe that Home is the real Capital for a family and grows in value across generations. Buying your first home early has compounding effect on your family’s wealth, happier lives and increased social security for you and your loved ones
interships.location_1: 602, 6 floor , Suratwala mark plazzo ,Suavespaces, opposite HP petrol pump , hinjawadi- 411057, pune, 411057.

interships.title: Laugh Out Loud Ventures
interships.idesc: If you've never worked in HR before, and if evil recruiting managers keep rejecting you from HR internships because of this fact, this internship is good news for you. Come in with zero HR experience (or a ton, either is fine) and we'll magically turn you into epic HR professionals who know everything about people (okay, maybe not that, but we'll definitely teach you a bunch of things about HR and leadership and silly jokes). This is completely work-from-home and we're flexible about work hours.
interships.companyDesc: We write jokes for people; we also make those jokes look nice, and sell them to other people. We are fun. We have multiple internships available in different fields.

interships.title: Bombay Hemp Company (BOHECO) Pvt. Ltd.
interships.idesc: We’re looking for a driven, ambitious individual who wants to create a career in social media and content marketing. We provide extensive training, guidance and support, as well as the opportunity to experience the industry from the inside and gain valuable work experience.
interships.companyDesc: We, Bombay Hemp Company, incorporated in 2013, are an Agro-based enterprise reimagining the future of Indian agriculture and sustainable living with hemp as our lens. Hemp’s uses are kaleidoscopic. Pull its Fibre out and it’ll give you Yarn; chop it into Softwood, it’ll give you material to build Shelter; study its Genetics, and you’ll find Medicine.  Our design fuses this very potential with the existing industries of Agriculture, Technology, and Medicine, to bring together Community, Impact, and Value.
interships.location_1: Bombay Hemp Company Pvt. Ltd. (BOHECO), Unit #2, Cama Industrial Estate, SunMill Compound Rd, Lower Parel, Mumbai – 400013, Maharashtra, India., mumbai, 400013

description: 1. You will be trained on managing and executing multi-channel marketing campaigns end-to-end
2. You will need to engage users on the social media platforms: FB, IG, TW, Fando, etc.
3. To do this, you will work closely with business owners to groom campaign requirements and then build selection workflows in a campaign too.
4. You will set up, test for accuracy, and confirm that campaigns, product offers, and promos are -ready for launch-
5. You will contribute to the future of the Fando app platform by improving processes, automating campaigns, and introducing efficiencies where possible.
6. You will help identify and roll out new technologies and data sources that bring efficiency and innovation to marketing processes.
7. You will work in teams to deliver on needs for targeted marketing data (e.g., targeted list, segmentation) and run marketing execution through CRM and related tools
internData.perks: Certificate of Internship, Letter of Recommendation, Possibility of Pre Placement Offer, Casual Attire, Free Snacks
internData.cDiscription: Fando is a network that plans to revolutionize creator monetization by creating a tokenized economy and marketplace. We allow creators to mint their own token to reward viewers & further monetize. Creators unlock their own creator tokens as they hit milestones. We have an increased watch time incentivized by token rewards. We incentivize fans to hold creator tokens by offering a variety of connection-based opportunities, e.g. merchandise, exclusive NFTs & voting rights on upcoming content & more.
internData.location: No. 94&95, 2nd Floor, SB Mansion, 13th Main Road, Devarachikkanahalli Main Rd, opposite Sri Sai Royale, Kaveri Nagar, Bengaluru, Karnataka 560068, bangalore, 560068.

description: We write and create humorous products for people; our Marketing Ambassadors help us market these products, and are an integral part of the team. We will assign a Team Lead and conduct training so you can do great Marketing Demos to potential clients. You will do great Marketing Demos to these clients, and will earn a lot of money. This is a good introductory internship in the field of sales, even if you don't have a lot of formal experience in the past.

Depending on your prior experience and skills, your work in the internship might have a Business Development and Marketing component, or more of a Marketing Communication component. This will be decided during the interview phase. All the work can be done entirely from home, and at flexible timings.
internData.perks: Certificate of Internship, Letter of Recommendation, Possibility of Pre Placement Offer, Flexible Hours, Casual Attire
internData.cDiscription: We write jokes for people; we also make those jokes look nice, and sell them to other people. We are fun. We have multiple internships available in different fields.
internData.location: Bangalore Chennai Delhi Mumbai Pune Thane
internData.jobLocations: Bangalore Chennai Delhi Mumbai Pune Thane

internData.cname: J K Diamonds Institute of Gems & Jewelry
description: Key responsibilities:
1. Conduct in-depth research on industry-related topics in order to develop original content
2. Create original content for blogs, articles, social media, and the company website
3. Write copy for paid ads
4. Write clear marketing copy to promote our courses
5. Proofread content for errors and inconsistencies
6. Proofread and edit blog posts before publication
7. Coordinate with marketing and design teams to illustrate articles
8. Create content for social media
9. Conduct deep research and content writing for thought leadership reports and valuable insights into gems and jewelry and the luxury industry
Requirements:
1. Candidates from Mumbai only
2. A minimum of 1 year of experience (preferred)
3. Excellent written and communication skills
4. Any graduate degree (degree in literature is preferred)
5. Familiarity with publications, blogging, etc.
6. Availability to join immediately (preferred)
Additional Information:
The ideal candidate should possess a passion for writing. You will be responsible for generating exciting and compelling stories on both digital and print sources of media.
1. Work Location: Andheri, Mumbai, Mumbai Suburban - 400069, Maharashtra (reliably commute (required))
2. Education: Bachelor's degree (required)
3. Language: English, Hindi (required)
4. Job type: Full-time, regular/permanent
Skills(s) required
Blogging,
Creative Writing, Digital Marketing, English Proficiency (Spoken), English Proficiency (Written), Search Engine Optimization(SEO), Social Media Marketing
internData.perks: Letter of Recommendation, Possibility of Pre Placement Offer
internData.cDiscription: J K Diamonds Institute of Gems & Jewelry® (JKDIGJ) is a renowned institute pioneering in Gems & Jewelry education. With unparalleled credentials, several jewelers across India have enrolled for courses at JKDIGJ. Several students have, in fact, turned to the booming Entrepreneurial market joining their own brands directly after completing their courses at JKDIGJ such as BN Jewellers, Siroya Jewellers (Dubai), Surana Jewellers of Jaipur, Mukti Gold, Vanaji Kesaji / Shah Chain, Vijayraj & Sons/Cha

description: Selected intern's day-to-day responsibilities include:
1. Preparing reports
2. Collecting and organizing data
3. Handling research on different topics provided
4. Assisting the psychologist in related tasks
5. Writing articles on psychology topics after careful research
6. Providing interesting and new mental health content for social media platforms
7. Preparing for online sessions
internData.perks: Certificate of Internship, Letter of Recommendation, Possibility of Pre Placement Offer, Flexible Hours, Casual Attire
internData.cDiscription: Ekakivedam believes that food, education, and health are the most significant pillars in one's life. Therefore, Ekakivedam strives to provide food, education, and medical aid to as many people as possible.

description: The selected candidate will be responsible for inside sales & lead generation. Key responsibilities include:
1) Familiarizing yourself with all products and services offered by our company.
2) Lead Generation through avenues like Linkedin, Facebook, D7Leadfinder, Apollo, Lusha etc (training provided)
3) Cold E-mailing using tools like mailshake (training provided)
4) Maintaining cordial relationships with existing clients to ensure that they are retained.
5) Crafting business proposals and contracts to draw in more revenue from clients.
internData.perks: Certificate of Internship, Possibility of Pre Placement Offer, Casual Attire
internData.cDiscription:
Afterfirst is a Digital Marketing company founded by an IIM-Ahmedabad (batch of 2003) alumnus.

Our USP:

a) Founded by actual entrepreneurs with 20+ years of practical ecommerce & digital marketing experience

b) Flat Hierarchy with direct training & exposure from the management team.

Our Vision

Attaining Top 10 rank worldwide in terms of thought leadership, in the area of Digital Marketing. Becoming the employer of choice for smart people looking to make a career in Digital Marketing & eCommerce
internData.location: A-210, Mondeal Heights, S.G. Highway, ahmedabad, 380015.

description: Afterfirst is one of the leading and prestigious Digital Marketing company founded by an IIM-Ahmedabad (batch of 2003) alumnus.
We offer services like Web Development, SEO, Paid Ads (PPC), SMO, Content Writing, Email Marketing, Digital Marketing Strategy to local and global clients. Visit www.afterfirst.com to learn more.
Our USPs:
a) Founded by actual entrepreneurs from IIM-A with 20+ years of practical ecommerce & digital marketing experience
b) Flat Hierarchy with direct training & exposure from the management team.
Our Vision

Attaining Top 10 rank worldwide in terms of thought leadership, in the area of Digital Marketing. Becoming the employer of choice for smart people looking to make a career in Digital Marketing & eCommerce
About the internship
Selected intern's day-to-day responsibilities include:
1. Creating Corporate Websites using Wordpress (training will be provided)
2. Gain hands on experience of SEO, PPC, SMO, Email Marketing, Content Marketing
3. Learning & using blogging tools
4. Selecting attractive images to suit the written articles, blog posts, copy
5. Being a part of a multi-functional, young team.
What would Interns learn in this Internship

The selected candidate would get to work directly with IIM-Ahmedabad alumnus with 20+ years of E-commerce experience. You would learn to create websites, and promote them using the latest techniques in Digital Marketing, Blogging and Social Media.
Where would you work?

We are located at one of the most fun and prestigious office complexes in Ahmedabad (Mondeal Heights), and are situated next to Wide Angle Multiplex; with access to some of the best eateries and food joints at S.G. Highway, Ahmedabad
internData.perks: Certificate of Internship, Possibility of Pre Placement Offer, Casual Attire

description: The selected intern's day-to-day responsibilities include:
1. Develop and maintain a comprehensive social media strategy
2. Manage social presence and create engaged communities across channels such as Facebook, Twitter, Pinterest, Instagram, Google, Quora, YouTube, StumbleUpon, etc.
internData.cDiscription: We are a creative digital content company producing brand stories in the form of digital videos, photoshoots, social media content, and creative copywriting. We understand that the digital space is filled with a lot of content that brands are apprehensive to associate with. Hence, we aim to create content that tells the consumer about the values and emotions that the brand stands for.
internData.location: 613- B, Samarth Aishwarya, Lion Sole Marg, Oshiwara, Andheri (W) Mumbai-400053, mumbai, 400053.

description: Please read the following instructions thoroughly and carefully. Please do not apply without the answers to both assessment questions with your best attempt and intentions. All applicants which miss these details will be rejected and blacklisted as it shows a lack of attention to detail, and an inability to follow instructions.
Selected intern's day-to-day responsibilities include:
1. Understand and explain the role of supply chains in the modern industrial economy by writing magazine articles and blog posts.
2. Review and improve articles and books written by professionals on modern supply chains.
3. Write promotional content for selling books and articles on supply chain management.
internData.perks: Certificate of Internship, Letter of Recommendation, Possibility of Pre Placement Offer, Flexible Hours, Casual Attire, Work from home  Prefered Skills
internData.cDiscription:
About Global Supply Chain Group
We are arguably one of the world's first top-tier strategy houses focused entirely on the art of supply chain management.

Since January 2000, our supply chain pioneers and thought leaders have powered business transformations in blue chip corporations, to continually strengthen and safeguard profitability.

Very few people on earth know supply chains like we do. We can prove this to you in due course. Retail, beverages, food, milk, dairy, meat, livestock, explosives, chemicals, cotton, rice, graphite, solar power, natural gas, crude oil, fertilizers, electronics, packaging, glass manufacturing, machine parts, automobiles, industrial goods, mining, etc are just some of the industries where boards and executives have benefited from our proprietary knowledge.

description: Digital Marketing Intern Duties and Responsibilities
Support our digital marketing team.
Content Writing.
Work on Search Engine Optimization (SEO).
Work on Social Media activities.
Produce website and social media content.
Work on Online Reputation Management.
Skills and Requirements:
Ability to manage and handle multiple tasks.
Good time Management Skills.
Ability to work independently as well as in a team.
Good communication skills.
Computer skills
Writing Skills
Training in Digital Marketing
Benefits of Internship:
Letter Of Recommendation
Opportunity to get a job in the same domain
Opportunity to develop new skills, build a network and learn new strategies.
internData.perks: Certificate of Internship, Letter of Recommendation, Flexible Hours, Learn more Digital Marketing Skills ie. SEO, SMO, Email Marketing, Content Writing, Lead Generation, ORM etc.
internData.cDiscription: AS Webworks is an IT services prover Established in 2016 that has been successfully present in the Web development market since that time has grown to become a well-regarded player in this industry and has proven to be a reliable, efficient, and trustworthy service provider to companies from everywhere the planet.

description: What are we looking for?

We are looking for someone who eats, breathes, and sleeps creativity so that they can bring our crazy vision to life by developing aesthetically pleasing designs for our social media channels like Facebook, Instagram, LinkedIn, Twitter etc.
internData.perks: Certificate of Internship, Letter of Recommendation, Possibility of Pre Placement Offer, Flexible Hours, Casual Attire
internData.cDiscription:
Listed is a platform to help creators leverage their social influence to raise capital from their fans.

Fans/investors are issued blockchain-based Fan Tokens, which represent a stake in the future earnings of the creator/project and exclusive access to loads of braggable perks.

The tokens are also backed by legally enforceable Income Sharing Agreements and are freely tradable in secondary markets. A platform to help creators leverage their social influence to raise capital from their fans. Who we are?- IIT-Delhi Alumni, seasoned entrepreneurs. Being backed by VCs who wrote cheques for Facebook, Spotify, musically, etc

internData.cDiscription:
Femina, a leading women's lifestyle magazine for over 60 years, has been capturing the essence of urban Indian women and celebrating Fashion, Beauty, and Lifestyle like no other. From showcasing the beauty icons and their styles over the years, the house of Femina now brings those Global Beauty trends, right next door with the launch of Femina FLAUNT Studio Salon.

A hotspot of Global Beauty Trends in HAIR, MAKE-UP, NAILS, AND SKIN
Co-lab with the best-in-class brands
A melting pot of global influences & Indian sensibilities
A blend of science-based rituals & pamper-based relationships
Collaborations with the best talent in the industry to offer you Style & Sass, that best goes with your attitude
A holistic approach to beauty where food & fitness come together too
internData.location: times of india building,cst , Mumbai, mumbai, 400001.

description: We Are Looking For MBA Fresher For 3 Month Internship At Our Bhopal Warehouse & Office . Need fresher Operations & Research Intern Who Can Play A Role Includes The Following Tasks:
• Maintaining Data In Excel . Coordinating With Vendor, Seller .
Follow-Up Calls . Make Spreadsheet, Statistic Data .
Working On MIS . Market Research .
Sending Email And Following Calls Successfull Candidate Will Be Given Internship Certificate Along With Monthly Stipend
internData.perks: Certificate of Internship, Letter of Recommendation, Possibility of Pre Placement Offer, Travelling allowance if they complete work as per company parameter
internData.cDiscription: Maa Reva Vedic Food Research is a social enterprise working as a contract farming & clean healthy organic food manufacturer, processor, and exporter. The company is part of US subsidy and focuses on tribal and women's livelihood via employment through artesian food, forest herbs, and dairy product manufacture and sale. Company work as a third-party manufacturer for India and Overseas Food Brand. Our group organization has a presence in 5 countries and its business portfolio is spread in Organic Farming, Machinery Import, Food Consulting, Business Consulting, Ayurveda Herbs.
internData.location: 127 Pallavi Nagar , Bawadia Kalan Road, bhopal, 462026.

description: Responsibilities:
Coordinate with hiring managers to identify staffing needs
Source potential candidates through online channels (e.g. social platforms and professional networks).
Evaluating applications and screening candidates via calls or emails
Plan in-person interviews and selection procedure.
Documenting processes and fostering good relationships with potential candidates and past applicants.
Design job descriptions and interview questions that reflect each position’s requirements.
Facilitating in the daily QC process of the database.
Developing hiring strategies and procedures in line with industry trends, as well as keeping informed of advancements in the field.
Manage team and help in the internal hiring process for interns and full-time employees.
Draft the recruitment consulting agreements for new clients.
Requirements:
Proven work experience as a Talent Acquisition Specialist or similar role.
Consultancy experience preferred.
2-4 years of work experience.
Familiarity with social media, resume databases and professional networks
Hands-on experience with full-cycle recruiting using various interview techniques and evaluation methods.
Advanced knowledge of effective hiring platforms that attract suitable applicants.
Exceptional ability to screen candidates compile shortlists and interview candidates.
Excellent verbal and written communication skills.
A keen understanding of the differences between various roles within organizations
jobData.cDiscription: We began as a quartet of 20-somethings, headed with one objective, to help our fellow mates land an internship. One year since, and we are a team of 12, with an extended family of thousands of students and companies using our services. Our fondest memory is that of the earliest calls we received from students who were ecstatic about landing an internship via our portal. Thats when we knew that what we began was actually serving a purpose. And we are not stopping any time soon!
jobData.location: 201-202, 2nd Floor, C wing, Trade World, Kamala Mills Compound, Lower Parel, Mumbai - 400013, mumbai, 400013.

description: Roles & Responsibilities :
- Ideate and develop social media strategy for campaigns
- Performance marketing and media planning
- Implementing and reporting the performance of social media campaigns
- Client relationship management with partner marketing teams
- Coordinating with the Creative, Design and Video teams to get the creatives, videos and content for the campaigns
- Design campaigns across Social, Web, Emailers, etc
- Building a Creative Media Plan by selecting the right channels, formats and placements for the campaign within the budget.
- The Marketing Manager will Liaison between HCPL and other service providers,stakeholders, etc
- Coordinates with Business to gather requirements, Design Documents, Business/ Data Flow Diagrams and other available artefacts.
- Provide data analysis and metric reporting of campaigns and website traffic
- Create, nurture and maintain an effective collaboration with our partners
- Manage and grow the HomeCapital Community
- Increase awareness of HomeCapital within alliance partners
- Organized approach with attention to details, problem solving and effective communication
& coordination with all stakeholders.
Platforms :
- Social Media platforms like Facebook, LinkedIn, Twitter, Instagram, Pinterest and likes, and Google
Skills and Qualifications:
- Bachelor's degree or master's degree from a tier 1 / premier college only
- At least 2 years- work experience
- Experience in start-up/ marketing/strategy/ consulting with exposure and knowledge of Banks/NBFCs
- Advanced analytical skills with experience collecting, organizing, analyzing, and disseminating abundant information with accuracy
- The ability to write reports
- Exceptional verbal, written, and visual communication skills

description: Responsibilities:
- Manage the monthly financial close process, including ensuring all costs incurred are properly recorded, reviewing journal entries, account balance reconciliations, and report preparation.

- Interacts at all levels and with Business unit owners or other stakeholders to produce timely, efficient, and accurate Business unit-wise monthly MIS and all internal management and financial reporting through annual reports.
- Participate in the ongoing development/ establishment of accounting policies, procedures, and SOPs including the review and implementation of process and system changes.
- Continued focus on improving system efficiencies and business practices.
- Ensure compliance with internal control policies and implement the best practices.
- Collaborate with external auditors and consultants to ensure successful audit results and compliance.
- Make recommendations for changes as needed and ensure that company policies and procedures are followed and ensure the proper controls.
- Responsible for a chart of accounts and accuracy in the general ledger and financial statements and ensuring complete accuracy in the classification and booking of all transactions.
- Work with Legal, Tax, and Treasury Managers to ensure overall coordination of all financial accounting activities.
- Actively review and advise on financial/ accounting processes.
- Cash Flow and Working capital management.
- Responsible for monthly, quarterly, and annual accounting closures in compliance with the applicable accounting standards.
- Ensuring effective and efficient accounts payable process with timely TDS, GST, payments, and vendor payments.
Requirements:
- CA with at least 1-3 years of relevant experience
- Strong accounting skills with up-to-date knowledge of Accounting standards and Corporate laws
- Basic knowledge about GST and income tax act.
- Basic knowledge of RBI/NHB compliances
- Ability to work independently and as a team member with excellent interpersonal skills.
- Knowledge of working on different accounting platforms/ systems.
- Taking ownership and leading new initiatives.
- Ability to multi-task and work under pressure
- Advanced Microsoft Excel, Word, and PowerPoint skills
- Highest standards of accuracy and precision; highly organized
- Ability to think creatively, be self-driven, and self-motivated
